metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33621 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The cgi gem before 0.1.0.2, 0.2.x before 0.2.2, and 0.3.x before 0.3.5 forRuby allows HTTP response splitting. This is relevant to applications thatuse untrusted user input either to generate an HTTP response or to create aCGI::Cookie object.

criterions.comment: ruby1.9.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby2.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
jruby package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
